title: Infant development in the kibbutz (TEFC)
brief_description: Examines infant behaviour under the kibbutz system of shared parental and group care. Shows activities of the “baby house” where babies ranging from newborn to 21 months old are cared for while their parents are at work.
description: Examines infant behaviour under the kibbutz system of shared parental and group care. Shows activities of the “baby house” where babies ranging from newborn to 21 months old are cared for while their parents are at work.
